channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Signal chat fallout, tariff tension — and 3 more takeaways from Trump's week
item.description: Here, five takeaways from a week when the Trump administration has had to deal with the Signal chat leak, announced new tariffs and made more deportat...

item.title: As protections expire, Ukrainians who escaped war face an uncertain future
item.description: A U.S. immigration program allowed hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians to escape war. As Trump decides whether or not to renew it, recipients fear bei...

item.title: Earthquake rocks Thailand and Myanmar, triggering the collapse of a Bangkok high-rise
item.description: The U.S. Geological Survey said the earthquake was a shallow 10 kilometers (6.2 miles), with an epicenter in Myanmar, according to preliminary reports...

item.title: Trump administration advances immigration crackdown on foreign student protesters
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said that his department has revoked the student visas of hundreds of students so far, with plans to cancel more.

item.title: U.S. revokes hundreds of visas to repress student activism. And, HHS cuts jobs
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says hundreds of visas have been revoked in an effort to repress student activism. And, the Trump administration plans ...

item.title: Putin floats idea of UN-led government in Ukraine
item.description: The move is seen as an attempt to challenge the legitimacy of the current authorities in Kyiv.

item.title: Greenlanders prepare for uncomfortable visit from US vice-president
item.description: Greenland is giving the cold shoulder to JD Vance and his wife, amid Trump's pledge to take control of the island.

item.title: Colleges rely on federal research funding. Under Trump, its future is in doubt
Dozens trapped under rubble after deadly quakes rock Thailand, Myanmar
item.description: Powerful earthquakes hit Myanmar and Thailand, trapping dozens of workers in a collapsed under-construction skyscraper in Bangkok.

item.title: Moment Bangkok high-rise under construction collapses
item.description: Workers are feared trapped following the collapse of a high-rise building in Thailand's capital.

item.title: Under-fire Zimbabwe president names new army chief
item.description: It comes ahead of planned protests by a group of war veterans who want Emmerson Mnangagwa to resign.

item.title: 3/27: The Daily Report
item.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on bipartisan calls for answers after the Signal group chat leak, how looming auto tariff policy could affect the U.S. market, ...

item.title: Superfans and spiderman: Africa's top shots
item.description: A selection of the week's best photos from across the African continent and beyond.

item.title: 3/27: CBS Evening News
item.description: Americans' pessimism about the economy is growing, poll finds; After record losing season for White Sox, hope is on the horizon

item.title: Selena Quintanilla's killer, Yolanda Saldívar, denied parole
item.description: Yolanda Saldívar was denied parole, the Texas Board of Pardons and Paroles confirmed in a statement posted to its webpage.

item.description: How auto tariffs will hit Americans' wallets; How cherry blossoms arrived to the U.S.
